topics.body:
The movie ends with a woman who has a electric wood saw for a hand, a massive freezing explosion to destroy the sharkandos, sending the main character flying into the air, where uses a chainsaw to fly and cut through a shark, and then uses a chain and hooks to steer a shark and land on the top spike of the Empire State building
All while everyone on the ground are killing the falling sharks with gardening tools, machine guns, chainsaws, and a makeshift flamethrowers
